name: Tank Yourself
description:
Tank Yourself is an action game where you shoot and defeat enemies to earn the highest possible score.

You control the flow of the game, by hitting the edge with your bullets, you spawn a new enemy.

Basic bullets deal 1 damage, but also spawn basic enemies if the projectile hits the edge. Mega bullets deal 2 damage and spawn mega enemies. The enemies you spawn, grant twice the score. 

By gaining points in rapid succession, you gain a combo-multiplier. Be careful, however, if you take any damage during an active combo multiplier, all the extra combo points get lost.

Controls:

- Click mouse: Fire basic bullets

- Hold mouse and release: Fire mega bullet
